document_data.name: ''Cleansing Medallion''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Cleansing medallions''''' were a type of small [[amulet]]s imbued with healing magics but not associated with any faith in particular.
document_data.Description: These medallions were small round [[silver]] disks that radiated an aura of well-being and comfort.
document_data.Powers: ''Cleansing medallions'' possessed magical healing capabilities. When wielded by [[cleric]]s and [[paladins]] that worship powers of good, the amulet drew upon their faith and focused it into divine magical healing, on par with the ''[[cure light wounds]]'' [[spell]] once per day.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1312}}, ''cleansing medallions'' were sold by the [[Temple Pavilion]] in the city of [[Targos]], during the [[Legion of the Chimera]] crisis.
